text:
Hello Support,

I would like help about a problem that I could not answer.

So I try to install Apache 2.2.22 with the link oci8 to connect my database with Oracle 10G on a OS windows server 2003.

So I have installed exactly the pre requisite necessary to work together apache with oci8

- Oracle instant client
- PHP 5.2.9
- Apache 2.2.22
- Oracle instant client 11G 32bits

I create the environnement variable TNS_ADMIN and PATH with the directory "D:\www\instantclient_11_1"

And when I start Apache, I have the error message in php log :

[29-Mar-2012 16:52:56] PHP Warning:  PHP Startup: Unable to load dynamic library 'd:/www/php-5/ext/php_oci8.dll' - %1 is not a valid Win32 application.

 in Unknown on line 0

[29-Mar-2012 16:52:56] PHP Warning:  PHP Startup: Unable to load dynamic library 'd:/www/php-5/ext/php_pdo_oci8.dll' - %1 is not a valid Win32 application.

 in Unknown on line 0

So could you tell me if Apache 2.2.22 needs some specifics parameters or modules to work fine with OCI8

Many thanks

AC
creator: alex_couturier@yahoo.com
covener@gmail.com
text: Bugzilla is for reporting bugs in Apache HTTP Server, not for support or discussion or for bugs/problems in things added to the HTTP Server.  I'd suggest a PHP or oracle support forum.
